label: Past Experience page limit and format
quote: Six pages (submitted separate from the PowerPoint slide)

label: Price volume format
quote: No limit Electronic (e-mail)

label: Electronic submission method
quote: Electronic submissions shall be submitted via electronic mail to Richard Kirby Contracting Specialist at richard.m.kirby@cbp.dhs.gov.

label: Oral Presentation slides format
quote: Oral Presentation slides shall be delivered in Microsoft® PowerPoint  2013 (or higher versions when available) for Oral Presentation Material.

label: Excel Pricing Spreadsheet format
quote: Excel Pricing Spreadsheet submissions must be delivered in Microsoft® Excel 2013 (or higher versions when available) for spreadsheet submissions.

label: PDF submission restriction
quote: Quoters shall not submit PDF documents, with the exception of the Volume I, Tab 1, Cover Letter and Tab 4 Past Experience.

label: Quotation preparation in accordance with instructions
quote: Quotations must be prepared in accordance with these instructions and provide all required information in the format specified.

label: Sufficient details for evaluation
quote: The Quoter is responsible for including sufficient details to permit a complete and accurate evaluation of the quotation.

label: Page/Slide limit enforcement
quote: Pages/Slides in excess of the maximum will be removed from the end of the quotation volume by the Contracting Officer without being evaluated.

label: No classified information
quote: No classified information shall be included in the Quoter's written quotation.

label: Proprietary information marking
quote: Proprietary information shall be clearly marked.

label: Quotes/Presentations clarity and detail
quote: Quotes/Presentations must be clear, coherent, and prepared in sufficient detail for effective evaluation.

label: Quotes/Presentations rationale and substantiation
quote: Quotes/Presentations must include convincing rationale and substantiation of all claims.

label: No assumption of prior knowledge by Government
quote: Quoters shall assume that the Government has no prior knowledge of their experience and will base its evaluation on the information presented in the Quoter's quote.

label: Minimum quote acceptance period
quote: The Government requires a minimum acceptance period of at least 90 calendar days from the quote due date.

label: Quoters shall NOT submit .zip files as these may be stripped by CBP’s email system.
quote: Quoters shall NOT submit .zip files as these may be stripped by CBP’s email system.

label: Quoters must ensure they submit quotations with sufficient time to reach the required destination no later than the response due date and time identified above.
quote: Quoters must ensure they submit quotations with sufficient time to reach the required destination no later than the response due date and time identified above.

label: Quoters are instructed to numerically identify their email submittals to include both the attachment number AND the total number of attachments.
quote: Quoters are instructed to numerically identify their email submittals to include both the attachment number AND the total number of attachments so that the Government may clearly see how many emails or attachments are being submitted (FOR EXAMPLE: 1 of 3; 2 of 3, 3 of 3).

label: Cover letter shall contain specified information.
quote: The cover letter shall contain the following information at a minimum: 1. Solicitation Number and Solicitation Title 2. Contractor Name 3. Unique Entity Identifier (UEI) Number 4. Cage 5. CBP HCATS IDIQ Number 6. Complete Business Mailing Address 7. Acknowledgement of any Amendment to this RFQ, to include signed copies attached to the cover letter. 8. Point(s) of Contact (Name, title, e-mail address, phone number);

label: Offeror shall submit a minimum of two and a maximum of three projects for Prior Experience Questionnaire.
quote: Regarding Prior Experience Questionnaire submission, the offeror shall submit a minimum of two and a maximum of three projects that address the questions listed in Attachment 1 and address the following elements:
section: Past Experience Volume I, Tab 4 : Factor 3

label: Prior experience cited should be ongoing projects or projects completed in the last three years.
quote: Prior experience cited should be ongoing projects or projects that have been completed in the last three years
section: Past Experience Volume I, Tab 4 : Factor 3

label: Offeror shall summarize each project and the prime contractor’s prior experience specific to providing the services identified in the SOW.
quote: As part of the questionnaire, the Offeror shall summarize each project and the prime contractor’s prior experience specific to providing the services identified in the SOW.
section: Past Experience Volume I, Tab 4 : Factor 3

label: Total number of pages for the PEQ shall not exceed six pages.
quote: The total number of pages for the PEQ shall not exceed six pages.
section: Past Experience Volume I, Tab 4 : Factor 3

label: Demonstrate current capacity to meet solicitation requirements
quote: The information provided shall demonstrate the Offeror’s current capacity to meet the requirements identified in the solicitation.
section: Factor 1 Technical Approach Volume I, Tab 2

label: Technical Volume format and length
quote: This Technical Volume shall not exceed 25 PowerPoint Slides, encompassed into one Power Point Presentation.
section: Factor 1 Technical Approach Volume I, Tab 2
